short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically organize and sort your bookmarks by name and see recent bookmarks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmarkly - Organize & Access Your Bookmarks Efficiently!

Tired of cluttered bookmarks? Bookmarkly is the powerful, easy-to-use Chrome extension that helps you keep your bookmarks organized and accessible with just a few clicks. Say goodbye to the chaos and start navigating your favorite sites effortlessly!

Key Features:
• One-Click Alphabetical Sorting: Quickly alphabetize your bookmarks folders for a cleaner, more structured view.
• Recent Bookmarks View: Instantly access your most recent bookmarks with a dedicated view—never lose track of your latest saved pages again!
• Seamless Integration: Works flawlessly within Chrome's bookmarking system, allowing you to drag, drop, and reorganize whenever you need.
• Efficient Workflow: Perfect for users who juggle multiple bookmarks—whether you're a student, researcher, or just someone with a bookmark-heavy browser, this extension boosts your productivity.

Keep your bookmarks under control and find what you need, when you need it. Download Bookmarkly today and enjoy a more streamlined browsing experience!
